list.name: Firezone (YC W22)
list.desc: A faster and simpler way to manage secure access to private resources. Basically a better VPN for teams.

list.name: Finn
list.desc: I made this SlackBot called Finn to help pick where to eat lunch at Jefit. Now, there are hundreds of teams from all over the world using it for running polls and random draws. It's pretty cool how it caught on, but I'm just happy it's making life a little easier for folks. If you're ever stuck on making a decision with your team, give Finn a try!

list.name: Flock
list.desc: Email based habit tracker built with AWS Lambda, SendGrid, and Flask. I couldn't figure out how to make money with the 400 users, so I stopped paying the Sendgrid bill. I think a few hundred people still track their workouts with it.
